subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: Blog plugin allows to create portlets linked with objects that are manageable in the associated admin feature.

subsection.name: Goal
subsection.p: The blog plugin's goal is to simplify the site administration page. In fact it allows to create and edit portlets content with the Keditor editor, which permits to paste tabs, images, lutece links and of course html content. The Blog object contains the author name and all previous versions that can be easily restored at any moment.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: There is two ways to create an Blog portlet :

ul.li: Create an blog post in the admin feature then link it to a new portlet
Dynamically create an blog portlet on the "site administration" page, and directly fill it in with the content of your choice

subsection.p: Moreover, every changes applied to either the portlet or it's linked blog is applied to the other.
